attributes.action: Call the referendum vote null and void.
attributes.additional_details: People voted on a false pretense and now this has been confirmed the people should be allowed to vote again now things have come to light.
attributes.background: Due to the leave campaign making false statements about firstly controlling immigration and secondly lying about 350million pounds being available to the nhs every week call the referendum vote null and void and have a2nd referendum based on facts not scaremongering and lies (applies to both sides)
